articles.author: Maria Cheng
articles.title: What is monkeypox? What to know about where it's spreading - The Associated Press
articles.description: LONDON (AP) — European and American health authorities have identified a number of monkeypox cases in recent days, mostly in young men. It's a surprising outbreak of disease that rarely appears outside Africa.

articles.title: Monkeypox cases detected in Europe and North America amid outbreak concerns - Dublin Live
articles.description: A WHO official gave RTE Radio One listeners an update today on the spread of Monkeypox
articles.content: Dozens of suspected or confirmed cases of Monkeypox have been detected in North America and Europe by health authorities, causing concern that the disease is spreading from Africa where it is endemic… [+2495 chars]

articles.title: Sequoia-backed CleverTap acquires rival Leanplum in stock-and-cash deal - Economic Times
articles.description: This acquisition will open up wider opportunities in markets for CleverTap across North America, Europe, Latin America, India, Southeast Asia and the Middle East, the company said. The deal is expected to close in the second quarter of 2022.
